Method.desc: Load layouts, bind per-layout hotkeys, and initialise the chooser.
Method.doc:
Load layouts, bind per-layout hotkeys, and initialise the chooser.

Returns:
 * The Ryoiki object
Method.name: start

Method.desc: Delete all hotkeys and destroy the chooser.
Method.doc:
Delete all hotkeys and destroy the chooser.

Returns:
 * The Ryoiki object
Method.name: stop

Method.desc: Bind additional hotkeys such as showChooser.
Method.doc:
Bind additional hotkeys such as showChooser.

Parameters:
 * map - A table with optional key `showChooser` = {mods, key}

Returns:
 * The Ryoiki object
Method.name: bindHotkeys

Method.doc:
Apply a named layout immediately.

Parameters:
 * name - String name of the layout to apply
Method.name: applyLayout
parameters: * name - String name of the layout

Method.desc: Reload layout files from layouts_dir and rebind per-layout hotkeys.
Method.doc: Reload layout files from layouts_dir and rebind per-layout hotkeys.
Method.name: reloadConfig

Variable.desc: Directory containing *.kdl layout files. Defaults to hs.configdir .. '/layouts'.
Variable.doc: Directory containing *.kdl layout files. Defaults to hs.configdir .. '/layouts'.
Variable.name: layouts_dir

doc: Window layout manager for Hammerspoon. Define layouts as individual KDL files and apply them via hotkeys or a chooser menu.
name: Ryoiki
